Title: Thoroughly crush the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee's capitalist class reactionary line, with Chen Pixian and Cao Diqiu as its heads
Designer: Red Worker Department Photography Section (红工司摄影部)
Publisher: Shanghai Red Workers Revolutionary Rebellion Headquarters / Shanghai shi hongse gongren geming zaofan zong siling bu (上海市红色工人革命造反总司令部)
Notes: Images of a meeting of ca. 100.000 people in Shanghai's People's Park, 6 January 1967, where Chen, Cao and other members of the Municipal Party Committee were publicly denounced and humiliated. They are forced to wear a sign with their name and their 'anti-revolutionary offences'.Pictured are Chen Pixian (陈丕显), Ma Tianshui (马天水), Zhang Chengzong (張承宗), Song Jiwen (宋季文) on the first row; Cao Diqiu (曹荻秋) - four photos, Meng Bo (孟波) on the second row; ??, Yang Xiguang (扬西光), Chen Linhu (陈琳瑚), ??, ?? on the third row.
